data.Title: Google Analytics 4 To Add AI-powered Insights To Reporting
data.Description: With UA going away completely soon -\> Google Analytics 4 To Add AI-powered Insights To Reporting

data.Title: Google Search Algorithm Leak: An SEO Game-Changer
data.Description: While Google has provided some insights on how its algorithm works in ranking web pages, most strategies we know are still based on studies and trials of marketers and SEO experts.

data.Title: Google Tests AI Overviews With Link Cards at the Top
data.Description: Google confirmed it is testing placing the link cards for the AI Overviews at the top - hope this rolls out but Google confirmed this is just a test...

data.Title: Google Chrome For Mobile Adds New Search Features
data.Description: Google Chrome for mobile adds new search features including local Chrome Actions, new search shortcuts, trending in search suggestions and more

data.Title: Google Says Its Search Rankings Can Improve But At Scale On System Level
data.Description: Danny Sullivan, the Google Search Liaison, said it again, that "there's clearly more we should be doing" with ranking websites that deserve to rank better in Google Search. He clarified that this is not something Google does manually, on a per-site basis. Instead, Google does this at scale by updating its ranking systems and algorithms, he said.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing’s Censorship in China Is Even “More Extreme” Than Chinese Companies’
data.Description: New Citizen Lab study comes as U.S. lawmakers scrutinize Microsoft’s willingness to comply with demands from Beijing.

data.Title: Google Ads Updates Query Matching And Brand Controls
data.Description: Google Ads updates to its Search ads query matching and brand controls that made advertisers happy. Includes better reporting for misspellings, negative keywords now block misspellings, and changes to brand inclusions and brand exclusions

data.Title: Google Drops Continuous Scroll On Desktop Search
data.Description: Google drops continuous scroll on desktop search (after 1.5 years) with mobile search to follow - to make search faster - bringing back classic pagination bar

data.Title: Google Says You Should 100% Mention The Brand Name Of The Product You Are Reviewing
data.Description: Google's Search Liaison, Danny Sullivan, responded to new SEO advice suggesting not to include brand names in product reviews, disagreeing and stating, "you shouldn't be afraid to mention the brand name of something you are reviewing."

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Verification Status Tool Gains More Options
data.Description: Google updates its Business Profiles verification status tool with additional options, providing businesses with more comprehensive insights into their verification process.

data.Title: Google News Sources And Google Publisher Center Stop Working, Now Fixed
data.Description: Google News sources and Google Publisher Center experienced an outage yesterday, which has now been resolved.

data.Title: New Google Ads Report For Target ROAS Insights
data.Description: Google Ads introduces a new insights box and report that provides target ROAS (Return on Ad Spend) insights for Performance Max and Standard Shopping campaigns, enhancing advertisers' ability to optimize campaign performance.

data.Title: Tech Companies Update Terms And Conditions To Include AI Language
data.Description: Tech companies are updating terms and conditions to incorporate AI language, aiming to utilize user data for AI model training.

data.Title: Reddit Implements Robots.txt Updates To Safeguard Against AI Crawlers
data.Description: Reddit implements robots.txt updates and rate-limiting measures to protect against AI crawlers.

data.Title: YouTube Tests Letting Viewers ‘Hype’ A Video
data.Description: Interesting -\> YouTube tests letting viewers ‘Hype’ a video "The ranking will appear in the 'Explore' section, separate from the "Trending" section. Note: Hypes are not used as an indicator for YouTube's search and discovery system."

data.Title: Amazon Is Working On An AI Chatbot, Codenamed Metis
data.Description: Will use RAG to generate up-to-date replies -\> Amazon is working on an AI chatbot, codenamed Metis, designed to compete directly with ChatGPT; It's tentatively slated for a September launch. "The chatbot would be accessed through a website and powered by an in-house AI model

data.Title: Google Is Developing Customizable Chatbots, Modeled On Celebrities
data.Description: What could go wrong? :) -\> Confirmed: Google has been developing a product to create customizable chatbots, which could be modeled on celebrities, and plans to launch it as soon as 2024 "Google has been developing a product for creating and conversing with customizable

data.Title: Google June 2024 Spam Update Is Now Complete
data.Description: Google June 2024 spam update is now complete - here is everything I know * Quick Facts * Volatility Tracking * Details on The Spam Update * Previous Spam Updates * More at seroundtable.com/google-june-20

data.Title: Report: Menu Items And How Busy You Are During Popular Times May Be Local Ranking Signals On Google
data.Description: Google has not specifically confirmed this but a new local SEO report says these may be newly discovered local ranking signals.

data.Title: Google Product Studio Now Works In The UK, India, And Japan
data.Description: Google Product Studio now works in the UK, India, and Japan. Plus there are new themes to choose from and new file upload feature

data.Title: Bing People Also Ask Can Include AI Generated Content
data.Description: Microsoft may now include AI generated content within the Bing Search people also ask sections.  Bing is labeling some of the people also ask boxes with the disclaimer, "Includes Al generated content."
